mapper.select: select id, rencai_fengxian, xingwei_fengxian, guanli_fengxian, jishu_fengxian, jingji_fengxian, rencai_pingjia, xingwei_pingjia, guanli_pingjia, jishu_pingjia, jingji_pingjia, create_user, pingjia_ren, fengxian_ren from lbs.mgr where id = #{id}

select id, rencai_fengxian, xingwei_fengxian, guanli_fengxian, jishu_fengxian, jingji_fengxian, rencai_pingjia, xingwei_pingjia, guanli_pingjia, jishu_pingjia, jingji_pingjia, create_user, pingjia_ren, fengxian_ren from lbs.mgr limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lbs.mgr(rencai_fengxian, xingwei_fengxian, guanli_fengxian, jishu_fengxian, jingji_fengxian, rencai_pingjia, xingwei_pingjia, guanli_pingjia, jishu_pingjia, jingji_pingjia, create_user, pingjia_ren, fengxian_ren) values (#{rencaiFengxian}, #{xingweiFengxian}, #{guanliFengxian}, #{jishuFengxian}, #{jingjiFengxian}, #{rencaiPingjia}, #{xingweiPingjia}, #{guanliPingjia}, #{jishuPingjia}, #{jingjiPingjia}, #{createUser}, #{pingjiaRen}, #{fengxianRen})
mapper.update:
update lbs.mgr
rencai_fengxian = #{rencaiFengxian},
xingwei_fengxian = #{xingweiFengxian},
guanli_fengxian = #{guanliFengxian},
jishu_fengxian = #{jishuFengxian},
jingji_fengxian = #{jingjiFengxian},
rencai_pingjia = #{rencaiPingjia},
xingwei_pingjia = #{xingweiPingjia},
guanli_pingjia = #{guanliPingjia},
jishu_pingjia = #{jishuPingjia},
jingji_pingjia = #{jingjiPingjia},
create_user = #{createUser},
pingjia_ren = #{pingjiaRen},
fengxian_ren = #{fengxianRen},
where id = #{id}
